creator: jeremy_a@bigfoot.com
text:
If I create a test plan which includes a Mailer Visualizer it does not save
correctly -- I end up with a 0 byte JMX file.  This can be reproduced with a
simple test plan containing just a Thread Group and a Mailer Visualizer.

If this isn't reproducible by other developers then I can provide more details
about my setup.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text: It's saving fine for me.  Are there any error messages when you do it?
If it's not fixed for you, let's talk about it online.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
